name: avalynx-select
title: AvalynxSelect
description: AvalynxSelect is a lightweight, customizable select dropdown component for web applications. It is designed to be used with Bootstrap version 5.3 or higher and does not require any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind an the Avalynx-Select authors

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-select.js dist/js/avalynx-select.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-select.js dist/js/avalynx-select.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-select.esm.js
